title: How to run a lathe
brief_description: Based on the book “How to run a lathe”. Explains how the lathe is essential to construction of anything containing metal— cars, ships, planes etc. Goes on the explain the parts of the lathe and how to operate them. Aimed at operators and machinists rather then general interest.
